table display values.back:
table -	defines a block-level table element
inline-table -	defines an inline table. generates an inline box
table-row -	elements in a row of cells
table-row-group -	groups one or more rows
table-header-group -	visually differnent, and is always displayed before all other rows and row groups
table-footer-group -	always displayed after all rows and row groups
table-column -	describes a column of cells
table-column-group -	groups one or more columns
table-cell -	single cell in a table
table-caption -	tables caption
